publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5655 Sarah Boyack: The Future of Scotland’s Organic Farming—That the Parliament acknowledges the progress made to date in implementing the Organic Action Plan; welcomes the increasing consumer demand for Scottish organic produce, the contribution of organic producers in improving the availability of good quality local food at local markets and the contribution of organic producers to sustainable development, and commits to continue to support the organic sector in the future. Supported by: Ross Finnie*
